questions_and_answers.question: How do I install ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes?
questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes
questions_and_answers.answer:
Clone the repository to `custom_nodes` in your ComfyUI directory: 
```
git clone https://github.com/Zuellni/ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes custom_nodes\Zuellni
```
A `config.json` file will be created on first run in the extension's directory.

questions_and_answers.question: How do I enable automatic updates for ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes?
questions_and_answers.subject: ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes
questions_and_answers.answer:
Set `Update Repository` to `true` in the config. You can also update with: 
```
git -C custom_nodes\Zuellni pull
```

questions_and_answers.question: What is the role of the Aesthetic Loader node in ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes?
questions_and_answers.subject: Aesthetic Loader Node
questions_and_answers.answer: The Aesthetic Loader node is used to load models for use with the `Aesthetic Select` node.

questions_and_answers.question: Can I use the IF nodes in ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes?
questions_and_answers.subject: IF Nodes
questions_and_answers.answer: There are a lot of issues with the `IF` nodes and the creator is no longer interested in dealing with it. You can skip the installation if you don't wish to use the `IF` nodes.

questions_and_answers.question: Can I use the IF nodes in ComfyUI-Custom-Nodes without agreeing to the terms of use on the site and creating an access token?
questions_and_answers.subject: IF Nodes
questions_and_answers.answer: No, you will have to agree to the terms of use on the site, create an access token, and log in with it to use the `IF` nodes.
